Articles.Content: I guess everyone has to start somewhere so this is the best place to do it. I came across this program from another space related site and have only been messing with it for a week but it has me hooked. Finally there is a worthy program for space nuts like me! Even in its raw form right now it is addictive. I can see that this program is only going to get better and better with age. Hopefully the Kerbals will entrust me with their safety. Off to read and learn more. Who knows maybe some of my knowledge will rub off on you, and a lot of your knowledge will rub off on me!

Hopefully the Kerbals will entrust me with their safety.

Bwahahahahaha!

*ahem*

That shouldn\'t be an issue

And, more importantly, welcome to the forums!

Have fun!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
